title: Setting the scene designer interviews: Stephen Curtis
brief_description: A co-production between AFTRS and ACMI for ACMI’s Setting the Scene exhibition. Stephen Curtis talks about his approach to production designing on his work on Bedevil and Night Cries. This was used as part of the Landscape Spaces section of the exhibition.
